title: Why can't my league update
body: Everytime it get's to a high percent it says "check your log" something like that, help me pls :c

replies.body:
When the patching process fails at a higher percentage of the progress, it's usually caused by the patcher losing connection to the patching server. I strongly recommend you ensure your local network settings are compatible with our [network guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if this issue persists through those changes.
